page.description: Allows you to store arbitrary data in the Dialog Component's 'state' object.

argument.name: obj
argument.description: A JSON object that specifies what data you want to store in the state object.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The data in the 'state' object is submitted along with the data in the Dialog controls every time you submit the Dialog, or make an Ajax callback.

section.title: Example
section.description: You can also set a property in the state info object directly (bypassing the .setStateInfo() method)
